meanings.definition: Most puckery or tart in taste.
meanings.sent1: The lemonade was the puckeriest drink I had ever tasted.
meanings.sent2: The sour candy was the puckeriest treat at the party.
meanings.sent3: She made a face after taking a sip of the puckeriest lemonade.
meanings.sent4: The puckeriest grape made her lips twist in discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The puckeriest vinegar made her eyes water with its sharp taste.

meanings.definition: Having the most puckers or wrinkles.
meanings.sent1: The puckeriest fabric was difficult to smooth out.
meanings.sent2: The puckeriest shirt needed extra ironing to look neat.
meanings.sent3: He joked that his puckeriest shirt looked like a crumpled paper ball.
meanings.sent4: The puckeriest blanket resembled a bunched-up map.
meanings.sent5: The puckeriest rug had deep creases that caught her toes.
